019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
022import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
023import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Secret;
024import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1SecretList;
025import io.kubernetes.client.util.Watch.Response;
026import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.ListOptions;
027import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
028import java.io.IOException;
029import java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException;
030import java.security.SecureRandom;
031import java.time.Instant;
032import java.util.Collections;
033import java.util.LinkedList;
034import java.util.List;
035import java.util.Map;
036import java.util.Scanner;
037import java.util.logging.Level;
038import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.APP_NAME;
039import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.VM_OP_NAME;
040import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sClient;
041import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sV1PodStub;
042import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sV1SecretStub;
043import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET;
044import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD;
045import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.DATA_PASSWORD_EXPIRY;
046import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.GetDisplayPassword;
047import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmChannel;
048import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmDefChanged;
049import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
050import org.jgrapes.core.CompletionLock;
051import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
052import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
053import org.jose4j.base64url.Base64;
054
055/**
056 * Watches for changes of display secrets.
057 */
058@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis", "PMD.TooManyStaticImports" })
059public class DisplaySecretMonitor
060        extends AbstractMonitor<V1Secret, V1SecretList, VmChannel> {
061
062    private final int passwordValidity = 10;
063    private final List<PendingGet> pendingGets
064        = Collections.synchronizedList(new LinkedList<>());
065
066    /**
067     * Instantiates a new display secrets monitor.
068     *
069     * @param componentChannel the component channel
070     */
071    public DisplaySecretMonitor(Channel componentChannel) {
072        super(componentChannel, V1Secret.class, V1SecretList.class);
073        context(K8sV1SecretStub.CONTEXT);
074        ListOptions options = new ListOptions();
075        options.setLabelSelector("app.kubernetes.io/name=" + APP_NAME + ","
076            + "app.kubernetes.io/component=" + COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET);
077        options(options);
078    }
079
080    @Override
081    protected void prepareMonitoring() throws IOException, ApiException {
082        client(new K8sClient());
083    }
084
085    @Override
086    protected void handleChange(K8sClient client, Response<V1Secret> change) {
087        String vmName = change.object.getMetadata().getLabels()
088            .get("app.kubernetes.io/instance");
089        if (vmName == null) {
090            return;
091        }
092        var channel = channel(vmName).orElse(null);
093        if (channel == null || channel.vmDefinition() == null) {
094            return;
095        }
096
097        try {
098            patchPod(client, change);
099        } catch (ApiException e) {
100            logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
101                () -> "Cannot patch pod annotations: " + e.getMessage());
102        }
103    }
104
105    private void patchPod(K8sClient client, Response<V1Secret> change)
106            throws ApiException {
107        // Force update for pod
108        ListOptions listOpts = new ListOptions();
109        listOpts.setLabelSelector(
110            "app.kubernetes.io/managed-by=" + VM_OP_NAME + ","
111                + "app.kubernetes.io/name=" + APP_NAME);
112        // Get pod, selected by label
113        var pods = K8sV1PodStub.list(client, namespace(), listOpts);
114
115        // If the VM is being created, the pod may not exist yet.
116        if (pods.isEmpty()) {
117            return;
118        }
119        var pod = pods.iterator().next();
120
121        // Patch pod annotation
122        PatchOptions patchOpts = new PatchOptions();
123        patchOpts.setFieldManager("kubernetes-java-kubectl-apply");
124        pod.patch(V1Patch.PATCH_FORMAT_JSON_PATCH,
125            new V1Patch("[{\"op\": \"replace\", \"path\": "
126                + "\"/metadata/annotations/vmrunner.jdrupes.org~1dpVersion\", "
127                + "\"value\": \""
128                + change.object.getMetadata().getResourceVersion()
129                + "\"}]"),
130            patchOpts);
131    }
132
133    /**
134     * On get display secrets.
135     *
136     * @param event the event
137     * @param channel the channel
138     * @throws ApiException the api exception
139     */
140    @Handler
141    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.StringInstantiation")
142    public void onGetDisplaySecrets(GetDisplayPassword event, VmChannel channel)
143            throws ApiException {
144        ListOptions options = new ListOptions();
145        options.setLabelSelector("app.kubernetes.io/name=" + APP_NAME + ","
146            + "app.kubernetes.io/component=" + COMP_DISPLAY_SECRET + ","
147            + "app.kubernetes.io/instance="
148            + event.vmDefinition().metadata().getName());
149        var stubs = K8sV1SecretStub.list(client(), namespace(), options);
150        if (stubs.isEmpty()) {
151            return;
152        }
153        var stub = stubs.iterator().next();
154
155        // Check validity
156        var model = stub.model().get();
157        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.StringInstantiation")
158        var expiry = new String(model.getData().get(DATA_PASSWORD_EXPIRY));
159        if (model.getData().get(DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD) != null
160            && stillValid(expiry)) {
161            event.setResult(
162                new String(model.getData().get(DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD)));
163            return;
164        }
165        updatePassword(stub, event);
166    }
167
168    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.StringInstantiation")
169    private void updatePassword(K8sV1SecretStub stub, GetDisplayPassword event)
170            throws ApiException {
171        SecureRandom random = null;
172        try {
173            random = SecureRandom.getInstanceStrong();
174        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException e) { // NOPMD
175            // "Every implementation of the Java platform is required
176            // to support at least one strong SecureRandom implementation."
177        }
178        byte[] bytes = new byte[16];
179        random.nextBytes(bytes);
180        var password = Base64.encode(bytes);
181        var model = stub.model().get();
182        model.setStringData(Map.of(DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD, password,
183            DATA_PASSWORD_EXPIRY,
184            Long.toString(Instant.now().getEpochSecond() + passwordValidity)));
185        event.setResult(password);
186
187        // Prepare wait for confirmation (by VM status change)
188        var pending = new PendingGet(event,
189            event.vmDefinition().displayPasswordSerial().orElse(0L) + 1,
190            new CompletionLock(event, 1500));
191        pendingGets.add(pending);
192        Event.onCompletion(event, e -> {
193            pendingGets.remove(pending);
194        });
195
196        // Update, will (eventually) trigger confirmation
197        stub.update(model).getObject();
198    }
199
200    private boolean stillValid(String expiry) {
201        if (expiry == null || "never".equals(expiry)) {
202            return true;
203        }
204        @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.CloseResource", "resource" })
205        var scanner = new Scanner(expiry);
206        if (!scanner.hasNextLong()) {
207            return false;
208        }
209        long expTime = scanner.nextLong();
210        return expTime > Instant.now().getEpochSecond() + passwordValidity;
211    }
212
213    /**
214     * On vm def changed.
215     *
216     * @param event the event
217     * @param channel the channel
218     */
219    @Handler
220    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, Channel channel) {
221        synchronized (pendingGets) {
222            String vmName = event.vmDefinition().metadata().getName();
223            for (var pending : pendingGets) {
224                if (pending.event.vmDefinition().metadata().getName()
225                    .equals(vmName)
226                    && event.vmDefinition().displayPasswordSerial()
227                        .map(s -> s >= pending.expectedSerial).orElse(false)) {
228                    pending.lock.remove();
229                    // pending will be removed from pendingGest by
230                    // waiting thread, see updatePassword
231                    continue;
232                }
233            }
234        }
235    }
236
237    /**
238     * The Class PendingGet.
239     */
240    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataClass")
241    private static class PendingGet {
242        public final GetDisplayPassword event;
243        public final long expectedSerial;
244        public final CompletionLock lock;
245
246        /**
247         * Instantiates a new pending get.
248         *
249         * @param event the event
250         * @param expectedSerial the expected serial
251         */
252        public PendingGet(GetDisplayPassword event, long expectedSerial,
253                CompletionLock lock) {
254            super();
255            this.event = event;
256            this.expectedSerial = expectedSerial;
257            this.lock = lock;
258        }
259    }
260}
